name: Factory Leftovers Original Gordo
additionalNotes: The Pigtail Brand Factory Leftovers are some of the best economic smokes on the market. Made using high-end medium filler tobacco from top cigar manufacturers in the business, which we of course we cannot name. The result is a cigar made with super high-end leftover tobacco, giving this cigar great flavor while keeping the price super low. What this means for you is a cigar with nearly the same great taste at less than a quarter of the price. We then use experienced rollers who are trained on how to make high quality medium filler cigars. The finished product speaks for itself, a fine cigar with lots of bold tobacco flavors at a fraction of the cost, you will have a hard time noticing that this brand is made with medium filler tobacco, the only downside is that these can only be made in limited quantity. Really a stellar smoke, great construction, burn, and flavor these are going to be a huge hit, and at these prices, downright the best bang for your buck!  The Pigtail Brand is now available in an Indonesian wrapper or genuine Connecticut Shade.
